text.name: console_notes
text.text: Capcom Co, Ltd. (株式会社 カ プ コ ン Kabushiki-gaisha Kapukon?) Is a Osaka-based Japanese developer and publisher of electronic games. It is known to have created multi-million dollar franchises such as Resident Evil, Street Fighter, Mega Man, Devil May Cry, Dino Crisis and Onimusha. Its main headquarters is located in Chuo-ku, Osaka. Founded in 1983, it has become an international company with divisions and subsidiaries in North America, Europe, and East Asia.
